reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and praise its great quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and great quality
items.body: This sweater is gorgeous. It's high quality and I have been asked if I got it at a boutique. The quality is really good and it doesn't pull easily. It is super soft. The material is thick but not uncomfortably so. I would suggest not drying it as it did shrink a little bit. Read more
items.author: KristinA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made
items.body: My daughter was very pleased with this sweater, she said it's cute, comfy, fits right. Would definitely recommend, shipping was fast my daughter now wants this for Christmas in more colors Read more
items.author: Rebecca Cronk

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Nice sweater but I think it runs a bit large. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!!!!
items.body: Sweater is wonderful and soft love it and it fits perfect!!!! Kept me warm in 55 degrees and all I needed was a body suit underneath. Read more
items.author: Tammy Brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cable Knit Sweater
items.body: I just got this in Mauve Taupe, and I am seriously impressed with the quality. The color is exactly what I was hoping for—a really pretty, sophisticated light purple/taupe that works well with everything. It has this gorgeous, detailed cable knit pattern, even running down the sleeves. It definitely looks like something you’d find at a pricey boutique. The material is fantastic; it’s a nice cotton blend that makes it soft, comfortable, and breathable. It’s a good, medium weight—not thin, but not overly bulky either. It's perfect for cooler weather. I love that it’s high-quality enough that it seems to hold its shape well. Just a tip: you probably want to skip the dryer with this one to keep it from shrinking. This sweater is exactly what I was looking for in an oversized fit. It’s relaxed, slouchy, and so cozy. I love the V-neck because it’s deep enough to look stylish and modern, and you can easily wear it off-the-shoulder for a chic, casual look. It’s even great for layering over a tee or turtleneck when it’s really cold. It feels true to size if you want that intentional oversized feel, but if you want it a little more fitted, you might consider sizing down. It’s easy to dress up or down, and I know I’ll be wearing this all winter! Read more
items.author: Customer Review

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy casual cotton cable comfort
items.body: There's nothing as cool and comfy as a cotton sweater. Unfortunately, cotton sweaters tend to look more like baggy burlap sacks after a few hours' wear. This IWD pullover starts out baggy by design, but keeps its shape partly due to its 40% acrylic content and partly due to the natural stability imparted by its cable knitting. (Cable knits are my all-time favorites in any case, but they're a godsend with cotton fibers.) The look is loose and casual, and you can picture this sweater slipping off one shoulder by accident or for style. In good weather, go braless, wear a strapless bra under it, or choose a sports bra whose straps become a feature of your ensemble. In cooler weather, slip it on over a tee shirt or cotton turtleneck. This sweater is definitely meant to be oversize, casual, and fun. It's true to size if that's the look you want. If you prefer something a bit more form-fitting, maybe go one size down. I got the mauve, which is slightly lighter than the listing photos show, but a very pretty color. Generally an all-round nice sweater adaptable to several seasons. Read more
items.author: Amazoniana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater!
items.body: Very cute! It was soft and warm. I am normally a large but I got an XL because I wanted that baggier look. I should’ve stayed with L because it was baggier than expected. I do wish it was a little more off shoulder but it’s cute! Read more
items.author: Ana Mejia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy & Chic! The Perfect Oversized Cable Knit Sweater
items.body: Style & Design: The cable knit detailing is beautiful and intricate, giving the sweater a classic, high-quality look. The V-neck is perfectly cut – deep enough to be stylish but not so low that it feels revealing, making it easy to dress up or down. The oversized fit is exactly what I wanted: relaxed, comfortable, and effortlessly chic. It drapes nicely without feeling sloppy, offering a great silhouette when paired with jeans, leggings, or even a skirt. Material & Comfort: The knit fabric is surprisingly soft and feels lovely against the skin. It has a nice weight to it, warm enough for chilly days but not overly heavy or bulky. Fit: I ordered my usual size S, and the fit is perfectly oversized, just like the description promised. The sleeves are long enough and the overall length is great for pairing with leggings or tucking loosely into jeans. The ribbed cuffs and hem keep everything in place comfortably. Color: The color purple is subtle and sophisticated, working well with various skin tones and other clothing items. It's a nice alternative to basic neutrals. 5'7" 130lbs Read more
items.author: Revive 75

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mauve Taupe, Olive, Red, Navy, Pink, Cream, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
